name: DWVR
description: Feel like an action hero while switching seamlessly between an arsenal of guns, swords and spells. Your VR controller becomes an extension of your arm as you blast the hordes of enemies.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: 2nd gen i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 970 Additional Notes: Oculus Minimum Requirements
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 64 bit Processor: 4th gen i7 Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080
